required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Adjunctive EndoAnchors for EVAR and TEVAR
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Adjunctive Use of EndoAnchors During of After EVAR and TEVAR

brief_summary.textblock:
EndoAnchors (Heli-FX device, Medtronic, Santa Rosa) have beed described to improve fixation (mimicking an open surgical anastomosis) during or after EVAR/TEVAR.
The investigators want to describe the outcomes of all consecutive patients treated with this device (retrospective and prospective data - observational study)

detailed_description.textblock:
EndoAnchors (Heli-FX device, Medtronic, Santa Rosa) have beed designed to improve the Endovascular aortic repair. This device is described to mimic an open surgical anastomosis during or after EVAR/TEVAR.
The investigators want to describe the outcomes of all consecutive patients treated with this device (retrospective and prospective data - observational study), these outcomes will be described in terms of type IA Endoleaks, migration and sac regression.

primary_outcome.measure: Rate of participants with type IA Endoleaks
primary_outcome.description: Absence of type IA Endoleaks during follow-up

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of participants with Endograft Migration
secondary_outcome.description: Analysis of Endograft migration during follow-up

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of participants with Sac regression
secondary_outcome.description: Analysis of Sac regression during follow-up

intervention.description: EndoAnchors adjunctive therapy for EVAR and TEVAR

study_pop.textblock: Patients with abdominal or thoracic aneurysms.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- All consecutive patients with adjunctive use of EndoAnchors during or after EVAR and TEVAR
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients that don't want te receive any repair for their disease

reference.citation: Reyes Valdivia A, Duque Santos Á, Pitoulias G, Aracil Sanus E, Ocaña Guaita J, Gandarias Zúñiga C. Predictors of inadequate EndoAnchors aortic wall penetration for the Endosutured therapy in hostile neck patients. J Cardiovasc Surg (Torino). 2020 Dec;61(6):738-744. doi: 10.23736/S0021-9509.20.11248-5. Epub 2020 Jun 19.

Reyes Valdivia A, Busto Suárez S, Duque Santos Á, Zanabili Al-Sibbai AA, Gandarias Zúñiga C, Chaudhuri A. Evaluation of EndoAnchor Aortic Wall Penetration After Thoracic Endovascular Aortic Repair. J Endovasc Ther. 2020 Apr;27(2):240-247. doi: 10.1177/1526602820907564.
